product_name: Sierra Designs Vapor Light 2 Tent - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Weighing in at a mere 3 lbs. 5 oz., the Sierra Designs Vapor Light 2 tent is the perfect shelter for backcountry enthusiasts looking to shed weight while remaining comfortable. Despite its lightweight design, the Vapor Light 2 offers a roomy 25.5 sq. ft. of floor space with an internal height of 38 in. All-mesh body eliminates weight while keeping you cool on warm summer nights. D-shaped door provides easy access without the need to crawl over your tentmate; 8 sq. ft. vestibule stores gear close by. Light yet strong, DAC NSL poles are anodized without the use of harmful acids. Taped rainfly seams and a PVC-free, seam-sealed floor offer weatherproof protection. Reflective trim aids nighttime visibility. Internal pockets keep small gear organized. The Sierra Designs Vapor Light 2 tent includes stuff sacks, guylines, tent stakes, user guide and setup instructions. Closeout.
short_description: Weighing in at a mere 3 lbs. 5 oz., the Sierra Designs Vapor Light 2 tent is the perfect shelter for backcountry enthusiasts looking to shed weight while remaining comfortable.
